channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Can Reality TV Make Sustainability A Reality?
item.description: Unscripted TV can be both escapist fun AND a fantastic way to normalise sustainability solutions.

item.title: ‘Supervive’ Looks Set To Be Steam Next Fest’s Biggest Hit
item.description: Steam Next Fest kicks off tomorrow and I’m expecting Supervive, a weird combination of MOBA and shooter, to be the biggest game of the event.

item.title: Public Perception Of Climate Change: Separating Fact From Fiction
item.description: What's the difference between climate and weather? Despite agreement among scientists, the public doesn't understand climate change.

item.title: The cheap chocolate system

item.title: “Please create more tension”

item.title: One Of The Best Sci-Fi Movies Of 2024 Is Exclusive To Max, Somehow
item.description: Looking for an excellent sci-fi movie to watch? One of the best of the year has arrived on HBO Max.
